body:
## Welcome to Sangyun's Pages.

* Name     : SangYun Han
* Country  : Republic of Korea
* Field    : Computer Engineering / Software / Network
* Email    : sangyun0628@khu.ac.kr
* Web page : [http://sangyun-han.github.io](http://sangyun-han.github.io)
* Blog     : [http://mainfunction.tistory.com](http://mainfunction.tistory.com/)
* LinkedIn : [Sangyun's Profile](https://kr.linkedin.com/pub/sangyun-han/a7/589/73)


* Current  : Kyung Hee University, Mobile Convergence Laboratory
* Previous : Samsung Software Membership
* Education: Kyung Hee University, Bachelor's degree(4) Double major in Computer Engineering & Electronics and Radio Engineering




### Experience

* Researcher

Mobile Convergence Lab (March 2014 - Present)

* Software Engineer

Samsung Software Membership (December 2012 - March 2015)


### Interest

* 5G Network
* NFV(Network Function Virtualization)
* SDN(Software Defined Networking)
* CCN(Content Centric Networking)
* Programmagle Networking
* IoT(Internet of Things)
* Open Source



### I am...
